page.title: 18Amenities
page.content: The area is commuter built up area. The main amenity is communication, which helps the rapid movement of population into Lonodn. In the centre of Longfield is the railway station opened in 192O. From that point on housing and amenities grew. The main built up areas consist of three nucleated villages _ e.g. Longfield, Isted Rise have basic amenities e.g. doctor, supermarket and chemists. As the area has large populated areas nearby families use these facilities as communications are good. Rural bus services are declining transport causing problems. The most important amenities are a supermarket and garages providing petrol and servicing facilities.
